sentences.en: a country that has dispensed with tariff barriers.
sentences.cn: 已废除关税障碍的国家

sentences.en: A lazy student can dispense with the original and use the English text as a trot.
sentences.cn: 懒学生可以把原文抛在一边而用英文直译本.

sentences.en: Can we dispense with the formalities?
sentences.cn: 咱们能免去这些礼节 吗 ?

sentences.en: Druggists must dispense medicines with the greatest care.
sentences.cn: 药剂师必须极其小心地配制药品.

sentences.en: For two weeks, the cash machine was unable to dispense money.
sentences.cn: 该自动取款机已有两个星期不能提供现金。

sentences.en: He is not yet well enough to dispense with the doctor's services.
sentences.cn: 他尚未痊愈,仍需医生照看.

sentences.en: He is not yet well enough to dispense with the pills.
He supposed, though, he would dispense with Dodo soon.
sentences.cn: 可是他觉得他不久会把多多抛弃的.

sentences.en: Indeed, agencies enjoy considerably wider power to dispense with formal proof than the courts do.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 行政机关较之法院享有更多更广泛的权力省却正式的举证.

sentences.en: It is so warm today that I can dispense with an overcoat.
sentences.cn: 今天天气很暖和,我可以不用穿大衣.

sentences.en: It's all part of a conspiracy to dispense with the town centre all together and move everything out to Meadowhall.
sentences.cn: 彻底抛开市中心而把所有东西都搬到梅多霍尔购物中心,这完全是一场阴谋的一部分.
让我们免去那些礼节吧

sentences.en: Most, if not all fungi can dispense with inorganic sources.
sentences.cn: 即使不是全部亦是大多数真菌可省去无机氮源.

sentences.en: They enable the composer to dispense with traditional instruments.
sentences.cn: 它们使作曲家可以不使用传统的乐器.

sentences.en: We cannot dispense with the idea of the speed of light.
sentences.cn: 我们不能废弃光速这个概念.

sentences.en: You can't dispense with a stove in winter here.
sentences.cn: 这里的冬天你不得不用炉子.

words.tran_cn: 可分配；可特别恕免；可宽恕
药剂师；施与者；分配者；自动售货机

trans.tran_en: to give something to people, especially in fixed amounts

trans.tran_cn: 分配， 分发； 配， 发
trans.tran_en: to give something to people, especially in fixed amounts
